text: South Carolina's 2nd congressional district is in central and southwestern South Carolina. The district includes Columbia to the South Carolina side of the Augusta, Georgia metropolitan area. From 1993 through 2012, it included all of Lexington, Jasper, Hampton, Allendale and Barnwell counties; most of Richland and Beaufort counties and parts of Aiken, Calhoun and Orangeburg counties. ==References== Category:Congressional districts of South Carolina
title: South Carolina's 2nd congressional district
